meanings.definition: The act of lowering in rank or position.
meanings.sent1: After the demotion, he had a lower job title.
meanings.sent2: Her demotion to a lower position was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The demotion in the company caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The demotion felt like a step backward in his career.
meanings.sent5: The demotion brought him down a level in the company hierarchy.

meanings.definition: The state of being lowered in rank or position.
meanings.sent1: She felt embarrassed by her demotion at work.
meanings.sent2: His demotion affected his confidence at work.
meanings.sent3: The demotion left him feeling undervalued.
meanings.sent4: The demotion was a blow to his ego.
meanings.sent5: The demotion served as a wake-up call for him to improve.
